Title: Radio Beat Jerusalem FM 94.3
Description: Live POP from Israel רדיו ביט שידרה בין השנים 2001-2002 בתדר 94.3FM בצפון הארץ, באמצעות משדרים רבי עוצמה אשר מוקמו באתר השידור בתפן. שידוריה נקלטו מחדרה ועד הגבול הצפוני של המדינה. התחנה שידרה עם אופי צעיר ודינאמי וצברה מאזינים רבים שעד היום זוכרים את שמה לטובה ומידי שבוע קיימה שידורי שטח ממועדונים בצפון... קרא עוד ש: ניתן לשמוע את הרדיו מחוץ לבית או ברכב? ת: כמובן! ניתן להאזין דרך טלפון סלולארי וחיבור אינטרנט, אפשר לחבר לאוזניות או למערכת השמע ברכב. נשמע מעולה וגם מגניב... קרא עוד

Title: Radio Tzafon Lelo 104.5 FM

Title: IDC Radio 106.2 FM  Tel Aviv
Description: The IDC International Radio (106.2FM) is a college radio station, broadcasting from the Sammy Ofer School of Communications at the Interdisciplinary  center (IDC) Herzliya. The radio is a project of the Asper Institute for New Media Diplomacy, sponsored  by the Asper Foundation. We are the only international college radio station in Israel (broadcasting in English)  and is operated by international students, who come from over 80 countries around the world. The IDC International radio is unique in offering this groups of diverse students the opportunity to broadcast, host, produce and edit professional shows on a variety of topics and share their experience of life in Israel with the world. Here is a video with a bit more information on who we are and what we do:

Title: Israel News Talk
Description: https://twitter.com/IsraelNewsRadio The new English-speaking Israeli radio network. News & Commentary from on-the-ground in Israel, with LIVE shows that invite your calls! Israel is always in the news. The world needs to hear the true facts about the Arab-Israeli conflict and understand Israeli politics and policies.    The global DEMAND for news in English from Israel is constantly on the rise for both Jewish and non-Jewish audiences who are hungry for up-to-date and on-demand information on Israel.   ISRAEL NEWS-TALK RADIO offers first hand, on-the-ground voices from Israel.    We are pleased to offer our news and programming for FREE so that they’re accessible to everyone everywhere!

Title: Radio Contrive-M
Description: 24-hour Internet radio station "Contrive-M" Good and pleasant music without bored advertising and other superfluous. Here you will hear - a variety of music in Russian and English. And, also during the day, such musical programs as "Music of the Mediterranean" (the language of Hebrew), "Songs of Love" (Retro 60's, 70's) and other programs are broadcasted ... Our motto: "For Everyone and Everyone - Just Good Music" Hebrew & Russian
